title: Pure N Spiration
headline: Latter Day Saint  |  Husband  |  Father  |  Full-Stack Developer

foundationalRoles.text: Great pride, passion, and enthusiasm goes into each foundational role.  They each require of many things, and here are some of those things:

Be unafraid and enjoy tackling challenges.  Be comfortable with the unnown.  Collaborate before making bigger decisions.  Strive to make solid decisions with sometimes limited information.  Be accountable for any outcome of the aforementioned decisions.  Strive to be ready and willing to try new things to learn and grow.
Each of the aformentied skills, traits, or abilities are what is striven for by me every single day in my programming journey.  They are key to who I am.  Though, do not just take my word for it.

interestsText.text: If you want to discover the true character of a person, you have only to observe what they are passionate about.
interestsText.author: ~ Shannon L. Alder
